►►► This video ◄◄◄  

After Trump and Biden both implemented various Huawei bans, the company's sales collapsed. Without Google services and chips they seemed doomed. But now thier sales are rising agiain, they made HarmonyOS Next without Android, they have Chiense chip production and more. How did they do it?

This video on Nebula: https://nebula.tv/videos/techaltar-hauweis-big-comeback-explained
